mapper.select: select r.*, c.code_name from recruit_board r, common_code c where r.employee_pattern = c.code_value
mapper.insert: insert into recruit_board(recruit_num, file_name, file_path, recruit_start, recruit_end, employee_pattern, recruit_title) values (#{recruit_num}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{recruit_start}, #{recruit_end}, #{recruit_pattern}, #{recruit_title})
